channel.title: I cant connect to hamachi servers HELP NEEDED :(
channel.description:
Ok I followed the steps given by mopar on how to get into hamachi servers, I was able to connect into one of the networks for Outer Banks but then I wasn't sure what to do from there. I ran the Mopar private server client in the backround, I put the hamachi Ip address in, with my Username and Password, and I thought maybe I had to be connected to a hamachi server network in the backround to be able to get into this server, but that didn't seem to work, here is a screenie of what Im stuck at.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v248/pikaabuu/HamachiHelp.jpg[/img]
Please, help would be highly appretiated.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 08:52:20 PM[/size][hr](If this is considered spam in any way Im sorry, but if you can help me please message me)

item.title: I cant connect to hamachi servers HELP NEEDED :(
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

pacman89012:

ok sometimes servers are offline like when the owner goes to sleep etc. so unless ur ip banned then thats the problem =]

Remember the Post is’nt allways 43594.
if your in the right port then the Owner is either offline,coding or asleep.
Not all servers go 24/7.

Read full topic
